revised_title: Founding of the Royal Society and Its Members
tldr: This volume acknowledges the debt owed to the founders of the Royal Society and provides biographical sketches of its twelve founding members, as well as some who played a significant role in its early days. It highlights the influence of the Civil War and the Restoration on the individuals who brought the Royal Society into existence and sheds light on the intellectual climate of the time.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
